complaint.description: You can submit a complaint if you feel like the assessment hasn't been fair: you will have the chance to describe what do you think is wrong, and why the submission should be reevaluated. The reevaluation will be performed by a different tutor.
complaint.moreFeedbackDescription: If something is not clear enough, or you need more explanations, request the tutor to give you more feedback
complaint.beDescriptive: Please try to be as descriptive as possible, including which parts of the submission you think we need to re-evaluate. If you don't have any complaint, but you think the feedback is not clear enough, just press the relative button.
complaint.alreadySubmitted: You have already submitted a complaint:
complaint.moreInfo: Submit complaint or ask for more feedback
